The only reason why we came here is because our concierge gave us a card and said that we would get free champagne (or something, I don't remember).  The location is really good, the service was okay (though we never did get our free drink).  You do have to pay an upcharge to sit outside and they charge you for bread.  It was unremarkable enough that I don't remember what I ate.  If you want remarkable food for a great price, go a short distance to Ciudad Condal.My Two Cents:  Reasonable price, great location, however, there are a lot better restaurants around Barcelona.
